title: Marketing / Sales Manager Job at Masruq Investment Limited
content:
Masruq Investment Limited is a leading agribusiness company based in Nigeria that was founded on January 22nd, 2015. Our primary emphasis is on the processing and production of high-quality agricultural products, particularly beans and other staple crops. Masruq is committed to bringing you the best products possible, made from locally sourced and responsibly grown ingredients. Our cutting-edge processing facility enables us to produce a diverse range of products such as peeled beans, bean flour, yam flour, plantain flour, chilli powder, and other spices.
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We take great pride in our commitment to quality, and our products are manufactured using stringent quality control procedures to ensure that you only receive the best. We are committed to providing you with the highest quality products at competitive prices, whether you are a wholesaler, retailer, or consumer. Masruq believes in long-term relationships with our customers and partners. Our team consists of experienced professionals who are committed to providing you with the best service possible and ensuring that you are completely satisfied with your experience with us.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing / Sales Manager

Job Locations: Bwari, Dutse & Kubwa - Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time
Department: Sales & Marketing
Reports to: General Manager / Managing Director

Job Summary


	The Marketing & Sales Manager will be responsible for developing and executing strategic marketing and sales plans to grow the company’s market share, increase brand visibility, and drive revenue.
	The role requires deep knowledge of the food industry, market trends, customer behavior, and strong leadership skills to manage a team and meet business targets.


Key Responsibilities
Sales Functions:


	Develop and implement effective sales strategies to achieve sales targets.
	Identify new markets and customer segments for the company’s food products.
	Build and maintain strong relationships with distributors, wholesalers, retailers, and key customers.
	Conduct regular market visits and oversee field sales activities to monitor performance and ensure market penetration.
	Negotiate and close business deals, pricing, and terms of sales agreements.
	Analyze sales performance metrics and provide detailed sales reports to management.


Marketing Functions:


	Design and execute marketing campaigns to promote products and increase brand awareness.
	Manage online and offline marketing activities including social media, advertising, product launches, and events.
	Conduct market research to identify consumer needs, preferences, and trends.
	Develop pricing strategies and promotional programs to drive product demand.
	Collaborate with product development and production teams to align product offerings with market demand.
	Monitor competitors’ marketing and sales activities to maintain a competitive edge.


Team Management:


	Lead and motivate the sales and marketing team to meet departmental goals.
	Conduct training and mentoring to improve team performance.
	Set sales targets, assign responsibilities, and track team progress.


Performance Indicators


	Monthly and annual sales target achievement
	Growth in market share
	ROI on marketing campaigns
	Customer acquisition and retention rates
	Distribution expansion


Key Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field.
	Minimum of 5 years of experience in sales and marketing, preferably in the food processing or FMCG industry.
	Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets.
	Strong understanding of local and regional market dynamics in the food industry.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and leadership skills.
	Proficient in Microsoft Office and CRM software.
	Ability to travel as required.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter in PDF only to: mmc.hr.recruits@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Project In-Charge Manager Job at PG Consulting Limited
content:
PG Consulting Limited is a recruitment, training and business consulting firm. We provide our clients - businesses and corporate organizations - across different industries with superior human capital, high-quality trainings and cutting-edge consulting to help them drive organizational growth, multiply staff productivity, gain appropriate market positioning and maximise profit.
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Over the course of almost 20 years of our existence, we have serviced various organizations, many of which are strong indigenous brands operating with global standards. We are most inclined to building strong brands and supporting business growth across industries. Our preference is to work with our clients as partners on an on-going basis towards making their organizations internally effective and more profitable. As we grow into the future, the sustaining core of our operations is working with you, all the way, from People to Profit.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Project In-Charge Manager

Job Location: Ajaokuta, Kogi
Employment Type: Fuultime
Industry: Manufacturing/Building Materials
Reporting To: Head of Engineering

Job Summary


	We are expanding our team and seeking a qualified and experienced Project In-Charge Manager to oversee operations at our Ajaokuta Plant.
	The role is responsible to work closely with project teams, managing day-to-day activities and ensuring proper coordination between project managers and the contractors.
	Act as a liaison to streamline processes and ensure alignment with project goals. Collaborate with subject matter experts and production teams to ensure that the project site runs smoothly, delivering value to the client while ensuring operational excellence.
	In Preparation of project Schedule & Execution of project, Preparation of Technical Specification & data sheets for RFQ, etc.


Experience & Key Responsibilities


	Work closely with project teams, managing day-to-day activities and ensuring proper coordination between project managers and the contractors. Act as a liaison to streamline processes and ensure alignment with project goals.
	Collaborate with subject matter experts and production teams to ensure that the project site runs smoothly, delivering value to the client while ensuring operational excellence.
	Provide on-site support to project teams during planning and execution phases, Supervision and arraging resources, Planning the material storage requirements, and Tracking of materials from storage location to project site.
	Preparation of project Schedule & Execution of project, Preparation of Technical Specification & data sheets for RFQ, etc
	Compliance to Safety management systems, work permits, Shutdown management, Site preparations for safe execution of the Project, Identifying the risk involved in the execution, mitigation plans and coordination for safe execution. Ensure a safe working environment for all project personnel, including contractors and subcontractors. Develop and implement safety plans and procedures to minimize the risk of accidents and injuries.
	Oversee the design documents, procurement trackings, installation, and testing Mechanical and electrical equipments. Ensuring the Project site is executing as per the approved design documents.
	Communicate project progress, risks, and issues to project manager. Prepare the daily Progress report (DPR) of the Project, monthly progress report, update the project milestones, Participate in the project review meetings and updating the Progress.
	Plan for shutdown management in coordination with user departments without effecting the project schedules. Follow isolation procedures and execution at the site.
	Preparation of AutoCAD drawings, review and explanation to the contractors for execution as per the Project documents.
	Escalating to project manager about all abnormal developments with respect to progress of work, safety, quality, resources etc. Daily Tool box meeting with Contractors, Coordination with OEM technicians during erection and commissioning.


Requirements


	Degree in Mechanical Engineering/ Electrical Engineering
	Strong project management skills, including planning, organizing, and controlling.
	Ability to manage multiple stakeholders and priorities.
	Skilled at increasing workforce productivity during execution
	Capable of managing multiple tasks and sections within a factory
	Technical awareness of civil, electro-mechanical and architectural works. Willing to work extra hours during the critical project milestones execution.
	Excellent command required in manpower management, scheduling management, providing techniques to increase the productivity of workers while execution.


Salary
Very Attractive

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their application with a copy of their CV to: jobs@pgconsultinguk.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

title: Digital Manager Job at Lucky Fibres Limited
content:
Lucky Fibres Limited started out making Nobel Carpets and rugs but pivoted into premium hair extensions by introducing Lush Hair in 2017. Since then, Lush Hair has become Increasingly Popular with consumers for its high quality and trendy styles.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Manager

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Company: Lush Hair Africa
Industry: FMCG / Beauty & Personal Care

About the Role
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a strategic, data-driven, and hands-on Digital Manager to lead our digital transformation and elevate our brand’s online presence across multiple African markets.
	In this role, you will drive performance across social media, e-commerce platforms, and digital marketing channels, creating impactful consumer experiences that drive awareness, engagement, and sales.
	The ideal candidate is passionate about digital innovation, performance marketing, and understands how to translate data into actionable strategies.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute a comprehensive digital strategy across all digital touchpoints: social media, website, e-commerce, email marketing, and paid media.
	Lead performance marketing efforts including PPC, paid social, and display campaigns to drive lead generation and conversions.
	Manage all social media platforms, planning content calendars, posting schedules, community engagement, and analytics tracking.
	Optimize the e-commerce experience across both owned and third-party platforms, improving customer journeys, conversion rates, and online sales.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams (brand, creative, trade) and external partners (agencies, influencers, e-commerce platforms) to drive cohesive execution.
	Stay updated on digital trends, platform algorithms, and competitor activity to guide strategic adjustments.
	Conduct A/B testing, map out customer journeys, and deliver regular performance reports with recommendations for continuous improvement.
	Ensure consistency in brand voice and visual identity across all online platforms.


Requirements & Qualifications


	Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Communications, Digital Media, or related field.
	5+ years of experience in digital marketing, preferably in the FMCG, beauty, or retail sector.
	Proven track record of managing paid media campaigns and e-commerce performance.
	Strong analytical skills and proficiency in using digital tools (Google Analytics, Meta Ads, Shopify, etc.).
	Excellent communication and project management skills.
	Experience working across African markets is a major advantage.(e.g., Ghana, Kenya, South Africa).


What We Offer


	A vibrant, collaborative, and growth-oriented work environment.
	The opportunity to shape and scale a leading brand’s digital future across African markets.
	Competitive compensation and benefits.
